author: cnbc.com
title: The Klein Law Firm Notifies Investors of an Investigation Concerning Possible Violations of Federal Securities Laws by WageWorks, Inc.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Klein Law Firm announces the commencement of an investigation of WageWorks, Inc. (NYSE:WAGE) concerning possible violations of federal securities laws.
On March 1, 2018, WageWorks announced it would delay filing its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2017. On this news the Companyâ€™s share price fell $9.75 per share, or nearly 20%, to close at $42.70 on March 1, 2018.
If you suffered a loss in WageWorks and wish to obtain additional information, please contact Joseph Klein, Esq. by telephone at 212-616-4899 or visit http://www.kkclasslaw.com/WAGE-Info-Request-Form-276 .
Joseph Klein, Esq. represents investors and participates in securities litigations involving financial fraud throughout the nation. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
